field.note: Select whether this design area should be printed or hidden in this design customisation
Select whether this design area should be cached in this design customisation. Caching improves performance but can reduce the currency of frontend output.

When enabled this design area will share a common cache entry everywhere it is used, irrespective of the URL. Enable if you can guarantee the design area content is not dynamic based on URL.
The URL recache suffix will not work for globally cached design areas. However you can clear global design area cache using the cache manager.
